text: My 90 year old mother had the 1st dose of the #COVID19 #Vaccine If she can do it w/out hesitation so should everyone. I'm counting the days until my husband & I can be vaccinated. We're in group 1c in Chicago. Husband may be in Group 1b due to severe asthma. Don't get Covid Lungs https://t.co/ssDpxU0e37
